name: Cake Build System
short_description: Cake is a build system that combines the flexibility of Python build scripts with an incremental build speed that matches build systems written in C/C++. It requires Python 2.4-3.2 and natively supports Windows, Linux, Mac, Cygwin, MSVC and GCC.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: MIT License
